trans-unit.source: According to HTTP protocol, HTTP headers must be sent before any type of content. This means that no characters should ever be sent before the header — not even an empty space!
trans-unit.target: 根据HTTP协议，必须在发送任何类型的内容 before 发送HTTP标头。这就是说，在标题之前绝对不能发送任何字符-甚至不能有空格！

trans-unit.source: According to the documentation, header() must be called before any actual output is sent.
trans-unit.target: 根据文档，必须在发送任何实际输出之前调用 header() 。

trans-unit.source: All the code must be executed before the above line.
trans-unit.target: 所有的代码必须在上面这一行之前执行。

trans-unit.source: Also, if you're going to use this to block un-authenticated users from certain pages, like you mentioned, keep in mind that some user agents will ignore this and continue on the current page anyway, so you'll need to die() after you send it.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果您要使用它来阻止某些页面上未经身份验证的用户（如您提到的那样），请记住，某些用户代理将忽略此页面并继续在当前页面上继续，因此您需要死亡（ ）发送后。

trans-unit.source: Although this is a quick-and-dirty way to achieve what was originally asked, it would eventually turn out to be an SEO disaster, as this kind of redirect is always interpreted as a 301 / 302 redirect, hence search engines will always see your index page as a re-directed page, and not something of a landing page / main page.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这是个快速实现最初要求的方法,但最终会变成一场SEO灾难,因为这种重定向总是被解释为301 302重定向,因此搜索引擎总是会把你的索引页看成是一个重定向的页面,而不是着陆页主页面的东西。

trans-unit.source: And also best practice is to call the exit() function right after the header() function to avoid the below code execution.
trans-unit.target: 最佳实践也是在 header() 函数之后立即调用exit （）函数，以避免执行以下代码。

trans-unit.source: As mentioned header() redirects only work before anything is written out. They usually fail if invoked inmidst HTML output. Then you might use a HTML header workaround (not very professional!) like:
trans-unit.target: 如前所述， header() 重定向仅在任何内容写出之前起作用。如果在HTML输出中调用它们，通常会失败。然后，您可以使用HTML标头解决方法（不是很专业！），例如：

trans-unit.source: By default, the type of redirection presented above is a temporary one. This means that search engines, such as Google Search, will not take the redirection into account when indexing.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,上面介绍的重定向类型为临时性的重定向。这意味着搜索引擎,如谷歌搜索,在索引时不会考虑到重定向。

trans-unit.source: Contrary to what some think, die() has nothing to do with redirection. Use it only if you want to redirect instead of normal execution.
trans-unit.target: 与某些想法相反， die() 与重定向无关。仅当您要重定向而不是正常执行时才使用它。

trans-unit.source: Don't forget to die()/exit()!
trans-unit.target: 不要忘记死()退出()!

trans-unit.source: I like the kind of redirection over time.
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢那种随着时间的流逝而转发。

trans-unit.source: I've already answered this question, but I'll do it again since in the meanwhile I've learnt that there are special cases if you're running in CLI (redirects cannot happen and thus shouldn't exit()) or if your webserver is running PHP as a (F)CGI (it needs a previously set Status header to properly redirect).
trans-unit.target: 我已经回答了这个问题，但是由于我同时了解到了某些特殊情况，如果您在CLI中运行（无法进行重定向，因此不应该 exit() ），或者您的网络服务器将PHP作为（F）CGI运行（它需要预先设置的 Status 标头才能正确重定向）。

trans-unit.source: I've also handled the issue of supporting the different HTTP redirection codes (301, 302, 303 and 307), as it was addressed in the comments of my previous answer. Here are the descriptions:
trans-unit.target: 我也处理的支持不同的HTTP重定向代码（问题 301 ， 302 ， 303 和 307 ），因为它是在我以前的答复的意见中提到。以下是说明：

trans-unit.source: In the eve of the semantic web, correctness is something to consider. Unfortunately, PHP's "Location"-header still uses the HTTP 302-redirect code, which, strictly, isn't the best one for redirection. The one it should use instead, is the 303 one.
trans-unit.target: 在语义网的前夕，要考虑正确性。不幸的是，PHP的“ Location”标头仍然使用HTTP 302重定向代码，严格来说，它不是用于重定向的最佳代码。它应该使用的是303号。

trans-unit.source: In this case, mypage.php is the address of the page to which you would like to redirect the visitors. This address can be absolute and may also include the parameters in this format: mypage.php?param1=val1&m2=val2)
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下， mypage.php 是您要将访问者重定向到的页面的地址。该地址可以是绝对地址，也可以包含以下格式的参数： mypage.php?param1=val1&m2=val2)

trans-unit.target: 是否可以通过使用PHP将用户重定向到不同的页面?

trans-unit.source: It will redirect properly to the location (index.php).
trans-unit.target: 它将正确地重定向到位置(index.php)。

trans-unit.source: Leaving that vital second line out might see you end up on The Daily WTF. The problem is that browsers do not have to respect the headers which your page return, so with headers being ignored, the rest of the page will be executed without a redirect.
trans-unit.target: 如果不留重要的第二句，可能会导致您最终无法接受The Daily WTF。问题是，浏览器不具备尊重，你的页面返回，所以用被忽略标题，页面的其余部分将不重定向执行的头。

trans-unit.source: Note: W3C mentions that the 303-header is incompatible with "many pre-HTTP/1.1 user agents. Currently used browsers are all HTTP/1.1 user agents. This is not true for many other user agents like spiders and robots.
trans-unit.target: 注意：W3C提到 303标头与“许多HTTP / 1.1之前的用户代理不兼容。当前使用的浏览器都是HTTP / 1.1用户代理。对于其他许多用户代理（例如蜘蛛网和漫游器）而言，情况并非如此。

trans-unit.source: Once this statement is executed, and output sent out, the browser will begin re-directing the user. However, ensure that there hasn't been any output (any echo / var_dump) before sending headers, else it will lead to errors.
trans-unit.target: 一旦这条语句被执行,并发送出输出,浏览器将开始重定向用户。但是,在发送headers之前要确保没有任何输出(任何echo var_dump),否则会导致错误。

trans-unit.source: PHP's "Location"-header still uses the HTTP 302-redirect code, but this is not the one you should use. You should consider either 301 (permanent redirect) or 303 (other).
trans-unit.target: PHP的“位置”标头仍然使用HTTP 302重定向代码，但这不是您应该使用的代码。您应该考虑301（永久重定向）或303（其他）。

trans-unit.source: Resuming — obligatory die()/exit() is some urban legend that has nothing to do with actual PHP. It has nothing to do with client "respecting" the Location: header. Sending a header does not stop PHP execution, regardless of the client used.
trans-unit.target: 继续—强制 die() / exit() 是一些都市传说，与实际的PHP无关。它与客户端“尊重” Location: 标头无关。无论使用哪种客户端，发送标头都不会停止PHP执行。

trans-unit.source: The PHP code located after the header() will be interpreted by the server, even if the visitor moves to the address specified in the redirection. trans-unit.source: When you click on the link above, you are automatically redirected to this page. Moreover, it is a permanent redirection (Status: 301 Moved Permanently). So, if you type the first URL into Google, you will automatically be redirected to the second, redirected link.

trans-unit.target: 你也可以重定向到外部页面,例如:。

trans-unit.source: You can attempt to use the PHP header function to do the redirect. You will want to set the output buffer so your browser doesn't throw a redirect warning to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 您可以尝试使用PHP header 函数进行重定向。您将需要设置输出缓冲区，以便您的浏览器不会向屏幕抛出重定向警告。

trans-unit.source: You can use session variables to control access to pages and authorize valid users as well:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用会话变量来控制对页面的访问,并对有效用户进行授权。

trans-unit.source: You can use some JavaScript methods like below
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用以下一些JavaScript方法

trans-unit.source: You can use the header() function to send a new HTTP header, but this must be sent to the browser before any HTML or text (so before the <!DOCTYPE ...> declaration, for example).
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 header() 函数发送新的HTTP标头，但是必须在任何HTML或文本之前（例如，在 <!DOCTYPE ...> 声明之前）将其发送到浏览器。

trans-unit.source: You can't really do it in PHP unless you buffer the page output and then later check for redirect condition. That might be too much of a hassle. Remember that headers are the first thing that is sent from the page. Most of the redirect is usually required later in the page. For that you have to buffer all the output of the page and check for redirect condition later. At that point you can either redirect page user header() or simply echo the buffered output.
trans-unit.target: 在PHP中,你不能真正做到这一点,除非你缓冲页面输出,然后再检查重定向条件。这可能会太麻烦了。记住,headers是页面中首先发送的东西。大部分的重定向通常需要在页面的后期进行。为此,你必须缓冲页面的所有输出,并在后面检查重定向条件。在这一点上,你可以通过重定向页面的用户header()或者简单地回传缓冲输出。

trans-unit.source: You may use the alternative method of http_redirect($url); which needs the PECL package pecl to be installed.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 http_redirect($url); 的替代方法。需要安装PECL软件包pecl。

trans-unit.source: You’ll then call the function for every page that you want to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">然后，您将为要认证的每个页面调用该函数。</font></font>

trans-unit.target: a)无参数的简单重定向

trans-unit.target: b)使用GET参数重定向

trans-unit.source: but if you use header function then some times you will get "warning like header already send" to resolve that do not echo or print before sending headers or you can simply use die() or exit() after header function.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果您使用标头函数，那么有时您会收到“警告，就像标头已经发送”这样的警告，以解决在发送标头之前不回显或打印的问题，或者您可以在标头函数之后简单地使用 die() 或 exit() 。

trans-unit.source: but you need to do it before you've sent any other output to the browser.
trans-unit.target: 但你需要在发送任何其他输出到浏览器之前进行。

trans-unit.source: here you will not face any problem
trans-unit.target: 在这里,你不会遇到任何问题

trans-unit.source: try this one
trans-unit.target: 试试这个
